item.title: Are we up for a crash? | JP Weekly 001
item.description: A lot of people are saying for years that we are in a bubble and that the market will crash soon. Now we might come to this point. S&P 500 The market is slowly turning more into the red. 1 month performance of S&P500 on 20.12.2021 Twitter And the rumors on twitter are increasing. The theme over the next several weeks is likely to be DEFLATION of risk assets.
